design.resource: ## Script (Python) "libDefault" ##bind container=container ##bind context=context ##bind namespace= ##bind script=script ##bind subpath=traverse_subpath ##parameters= ##title= ## db = plominoContext.getParentDatabase() idx = db.getIndex() is_doc = isDocument(plominoDocument) doc = is_doc and plominoDocument or None req = getattr(plominoContext, 'REQUEST', None)
